author: giacomo
msg: add option to activate platform MBean server on version >1.4

author: tomdz
msg: Simplified builders by giving the ability to specify default sizes per datatype in the platform info, and by allowing for a placeholder for the size in the native type spec
Added workaround for Derby which doesn't like BigDecimal objects in setObject
Added ability for the platforms to postprocess the model read from the database; is used right now to remove the quotation marks from the default value for text-type columns

author: elecharny
msg: Added a utf8ToString() methods which take a new argument :
the nimber of bytes to be decoded.

author: elecharny
msg: Added tests for the new methods added in StringUtils
